data.title: Greatest Ugandan Actors
data.text:
1. Florence Kasumba (b. 1976 )

With an HPI of 42.24 , Florence Kasumba is the most famous Ugandan Actor . Her biography has been translated into 25 different languages on wikipedia.

Florence Kasumba (born 26 October 1976) is a Ugandan-born German actress. She is best known for her portrayal of Ayo in the Marvel Cinematic Universe films Captain America: Civil War (2016), Black Panther (2018), Avengers: Infinity War (2018), and Black Panther: Wakanda Forever (2022), as well as the Disney+ series The Falcon and the Winter Soldier (2021). She is also known for her acting in German and Dutch films. She also played Senator Acantha in Wonder Woman (2017), Shenzi in The Lion King (2019), and the Wicked Witch of the East in the NBC television series Emerald City (2017).

2 . Phill Lewis (b. 1968 )

With an HPI of 41.43 , Phill Lewis is the 2nd most famous Ugandan Actor . His biography has been translated into 27 different languages.

Phillip David Lewis (born February 14, 1968) is an American actor, comedian, and director. He is best known for playing hotel manager Mr. Moseby on the Disney Channel series The Suite Life of Zack & Cody and its spin-off, The Suite Life on Deck. Lewis has also appeared in series such as Lizzie McGuire, Friends, The Wayans Bros., Yes, Dear, Scrubs, and How I Met Your Mother.
